title: Project Setup
content:
1. Email Notification Assignment of personnel to KPMG Clara deployment projects is notified via e-mails. Refresh your engagement list in eAudiT and search for the latest engagement. 2. Shared Folder Set Up Ensure your engagement project is set up in KPMG shared folder. 3. Data Provided by Client Source documents are provided by client, and they are usually stored in a folder named “PBC”.
The mandatory information required to proceed KPMG Clara deployment projects are listed below:
 Chart of accounts Trial balance Journal entry listing Journal entry high risk criteria  Navigate into the “PBC” folder and perform completeness checking on the data source. Further steps are detailed in the next section.

title: Data Source
content:
1. Duplicate Data to Local Workspace Assign a copy of data source to your local storage. The purpose is to avoid unnecessary changes in the original data. 2. Rename Local Work Folder Extend your local working folder name to include the label “-local”. 3. Data Arrangement Group data according to document types. Create new folders to store data separately if needed.
The common practice is to store general ledgers and trial balances into respective folders.

title: Data File Structure
content:
Structure Management The required fields are necessary for successful Data Import. When the column headers in the source file are renamed to the database name listed in the table below auto mapping of the headers will occur. This minimizes the time spent on performing column mapping in the �Transform� screen in Data Management. Please note that although the L1 data structure is able to import fields that have higher length limits than listed below, data processing will fail.
Chart of Accounts (GLA) file General Ledger Account Balances (GLAB) file Journal Entry Transactions (JET) file

title: KPMG Clara CAATs Document
content:
Purpose KPMG Clara Computer Assisted Audit Techniques (CAATs) Document is designed to assist the engagement team with documenting the procedures performed on data used in KPMG Clara’ s Advanced Capabilities.
Document   Download files   KPMG Clara Computer Assisted Audit Techniques.docx  (24 ko)   KPMG Clara Computer Assisted Audit Techniques.pdf  (45 ko)
